medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started 2 hours after consuming 2 slices of pizza about 8 hours ago, described as gnawing, intermittent in nature, with episodes overnight, and non-radiating. The patient had a similar episode 1 month ago that resolved spontaneously.
medical_history.social_history: Still lactating; takes ibuprofen 2x/month for migraines.
